name: Treasure Hunt
description: Untold treasures await the many denizens of the Alpha and Beta Quadrants flocking toward the Delta Quadrant, prompting the Quadrant's own to embark on their own desperate quest for riches and glory.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Gul Evek, any version of Neelix, Kes, Quark, or Voyager crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Gul Evek, Neelix, Kes, Quark, or Voyager
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Mark
featured_crew.flavor: Janeway leaves for Voyager, but her fiancé Mark still has an equally important mission - to look after her dog Mollie.

action.name: Is This Another 'Love Me, Love My Dog' Demand?

featured_crew.name: Kes
featured_crew.flavor: Kes is really interested in the Doctor's experiment with his holographic family. Therefore, she gladly helps him and even agrees to come to dinner to meet the Doctor's family.

featured_crew.name: Icheb
featured_crew.flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Seven’s methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Evek
rewards.flavor: While in hot pursuit of the Val Jean, Gul Evek's own ship hit a plasma storm and suddenly he had much bigger concerns.

action.name: Cut Your Engines And Prepare To Surrender

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Janeway leaves for Voyager, but her fiancé Mark still has an equally important mission - to look after her dog Mollie.

action.name: Is This Another 'Love Me, Love My Dog' Demand?

rewards.name: Icheb
rewards.flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Seven’s methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Icheb
rewards.flavor: Icheb takes a stand against Seven’s methods of assimilating the recovered Borg children into civilian life.

rewards.name: Kes
rewards.flavor: Kes is really interested in the Doctor's experiment with his holographic family. Therefore, she gladly helps him and even agrees to come to dinner to meet the Doctor's family.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Raid the riches of the Quadrant with the Cardassians.

potential_rewards.name: Cardassian Union Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Cardassian faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Find hidden treasure with the Ferengi Traditionalists.
